mention.text: Djibouti , a tiny nation in the Horn of Africa
a tiny nation in the Horn of Africa
20 years The US has signed a deal with Djibouti , a tiny nation in the Horn of Africa , extending by decades the presence of America s largest
Camp Lemonnier , a former French Foreign Legion facility in Djibouti , after the 9/11 terrorist attack triggered a shift of US global military deployment
a sprawling base hosting 4,000 troops , including special operations units , with a $ 1.4 billion expansion plan in the execution
Camp Lemonnier is Yemeni national Mohammed Abdullah Saleh Asad , who said he was arrested in 2003 in Tanzania and taken on a private flight to Djibouti
